Test Description: Testing ability to optimize moves or scoring for a given game state and trying to have a grounded rule application
Difficulty Notes: Easy optimization problem with intuitive solution
Question: Considering the situation that the blue player has three turns one after the other. What is the maximum score that the blue player can achieve by the end of these 3 turns. return the answer in the following format: [total_points = <the maximum points by the end of three turns>]
